reviews.text: At Patriot Roofing Texas, we believe in long-term care, not short-term sales. That’s why we created the Patriot Legacy Shield — a roof maintenance and protection plan designed to help homeowners stay ahead of issues and protect their investment. ✅ Annual inspection, reseals, and minor maintenance ✅ Priority storm response and documentation ✅ Legacy Match credit toward future roof replacement ✅ A portion of every membership directly supports local families, veterans, and community projects This p
